Articles.Content:
So I know everyone here is already hooked, but I figured I'd share anyways. Just started a casual gamers perspective gaming blog, been having fun with the write-ups so far.

Just added one on KSP. Will be cycling through games, but I play KSP enough that I will be back to this game before long, and plan to do more in depth posts, mission descriptions, and once everything gets up and running smoothly, will be adding some videos as well!

Thanks!

RM

Helps if I add the link >.<

Edited May 29, 2014 by Driachan
Added link...
So is there any particular place this blog is located?
